refnamediv.refpurpose: A simple pygtk application for create md5 and other checksum

refsect1.title: DESCRIPCION
refsect1.simpara: pysum is a simple pygtk application for create and verify md5, sha-1, sha-256 and other checksum. Written in python using PyGTK and it’s licensed under the GPL.

refsect1.title: BUGS
refsect1.simpara: You can enter a bug into the Berlios Bug Tracking System, this system can be found on http://developer.berlios.de/bugs/?group_id=9993

refsect1.title: AUTHOR
refsect1.simpara: Written by Daniel Fuentes B. dbfuentes@gmail.com
